outline:
1. to sow, scatter seed
    1. (Qal)
      1. to sow
      2. producing, yielding seed
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be sown
      2. to become pregnant, be made pregnant
    3. (Pual) to be sown
    4. (Hiphil) to produce seed, yield seed
kjv_def: bear, conceive seed, set with sow(-er), yield.
strongs_def: to sow; figuratively, to disseminate, plant, fructify
